name: Word Travels - Crossy Words
description:
"Word Travels - Crossy Words" is a new game that takes its players around the world in search of adventures and new words.

Word game combines old school crossword games in a new genre known as Word Puzzles. The goal in each mission is to connect the letters in order to discover all the words in the crossword.

The Player progresses through zones and individual missions in order to become a master explorer with extraordinary vocabulary!

Stimulate your brain with the brain training game that starts easy but quickly gets challenging… And, it’s free.

Travel in the most beautiful places around the world, solving challenging puzzles and learning new words. Sneak peeks at beautiful images from New York, Spain, Japan, Africa, South-America and more

• Get points for EVERY word you find, if it’s not in the crossword, you’ll get bonus points for it!

• Discover and learn new words with our dictionary feature, powered by Oxford dictionaries!

• Travel in the most beautiful places in the world, learning words!

• We are adding new levels! Thank you for your patience

In-app purchases available and help us to make our game better.

Please contact us at support@funstudio.io with any questions or to report bugs.
